Headline: Buses rerouted off of DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: Buses are being rerouted away from outer DuSable Lake Shore Drive because of conditions from severe weather. transitchicago.com/alerts

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Buses are being rerouted away from DuSable Lake Shore Drive's outer lanes because of roadway conditions from severe weather.

See the following detailed alerts for each route's temporary routing:

#6 Jackson Park Express 
#J14 Jeffery Jump 
#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express 
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute Away From DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: 146 buses temp. NB via Michigan,Inner, LaSalle,Stockton,Cannon, Sheridan,LSDr;SB Inner,LSD West,Cannon,Flrtn,Stktn,Las,Inner,Mich

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to roadway conditions from severe weather:

Northbound buses are rerouted via Michigan, Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Sheridan and Lake Shore Drive.
Southbound buses are rerouted via Foster, Marine, Lake Shore Drive, Lake Shore Drive West, Cannon, Fullerton, Stockton, LaSalle, Lake Shore Drive and Michigan. 
Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute Away From DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable LSD Express NB via Michigan, Inner, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Sheridan, LSDr; SB Inner, LSD West, Cannon, Flrtn, Stktn, LaS, Inner, Mich

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to roadway conditions from severe weather.

Northbound buses are rerouted via Michigan, Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Sheridan, and Lake Shore Drive.
Southbound buses are rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Lake Shore Drive West, Cannon, Fullerton, Stockton, LaSalle, Lake Shore Drive and Michigan.
Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute Away From DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: 6 buses are temporarily rerouted NB via Lake Park, 47th, King Dr, Cermak to Michigan. SB via reverse from Balbo/Michigan, due to severe weather.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound buses are rerouted via Lake Park, 47th, King Drive and Cermak then resume their normal route on Michigan.
Southbound buses are rerouted via the same streets, starting after Balbo/Michigan.
Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute Away From DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: J14 buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Isl, 57th, Hyde Pk, Lake Pk, 47th, King Dr, Cermak, Michigan and Balbo, due to severe weather.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Buses, in both directions, are rerouted via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 57th, Hyde Park, Lake Park, 47th, King Drive, Cermak, Michigan and Balbo.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute at Lafayette/79th
ShortDescription: 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Vincennes, 83rd, and Lafayette due to, street blockage near Lafayette/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Vincennes, 83rd, and Lafayette due to, street blockage near Lafayette/79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Ashland/63rd
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Ashland/63rd due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Ashland/63rd due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
